duties_responsibilities.duty: Service and repair automotive systems with a focus on providing exceptional customer and vehicle service.
Conduct road tests and inspections on assigned vehicles, accurately communicate mechanical diagnoses and needed repairs to non-mechanical individuals.
Maintain service center standards, cleanliness, and orderliness, review maintenance/operating efficiency of tools and store equipment.
Perform tire service, oil changes, alignments, fluid services, brake services, and handle store deliveries of tires and automotive products.
Adhere to company safety policies, attend meetings as required, and provide on-the-job training for new team members.

education_certification.credential: Minimum of 2 years of automotive repair experience, completion of Vocational-Technical School program in a related field, or demonstrated skills via third-party certificates/assessment. A.S.E. certification in at least one of A1-A8 is preferred.
